title: Why did a Samsung satellite fall from the sky?
text: Samsung's “Space Selfie” satellite crashed this week on a Michigan farm. Legal and media analyst Lionel takes us through the implications of so-called space junk. Meanwhile, after a polarizing parliamentary election, many in western Canada are stoking a separatist movement that some are calling “Wexit.” RT America’s Alex Mihailovich reports. Plus, Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg is testifying Tuesday before the US Senate Commerce Committee to answer questions about the aviation giant’s 737 MAX airplane, which is still grounded after two fatal crashes earlier this year. RT America’s Faran Fronczak reports live in Washington.
description: Samsung's “Space Selfie” satellite crashed this week on a Michigan farm Legal and media analyst Lionel takes us through the implications of so-called space junk
